name: Topsy Turvy
overview: A cute and fun Q-Bert clone game released in demo form in 1991 by Joerg Schmidt and Tarkus Team 91. The game has many features not featured in the original game, starting off much more difficult, in potentially requiring several color changes on all blocks, and having many baddies to avoid including springs, rubber balls, ghosts and other monsters as well as pickups that will help in game.
